Courses.title: Bloom courses
Courses.introduction: Bloom courses offer tailored information, guidance, tools, and affirming words to help us cope with traumatic events. The courses encourage us to learn, reflect, and process what we’ve been through and how it may have affected us – all in a safe and empowering space.
